label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡肌胃糜烂症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":13,"text":"肌胃腐蚀症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"肌胃溃疡","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":24,"text":"黑色呕吐病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"黑胃病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":44,"end":50,"text":"非传染性疾病","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":31,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"胃肠出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"胃肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"蛋鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡肌胃糜烂症亦称肌胃腐蚀症、肌胃溃疡、黑色呕吐病、黑胃病，是鸡的一种与人的胃肠出血相似的非传染性疾病，主要发生于肉鸡，其次是蛋鸡和鸭。

label: [{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":25,"end":30,"text":"呕吐黑色物","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"黑色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":37,"text":"肌胃黏膜损伤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"损伤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"表层糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":54,"text":"广泛的溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":61,"end":64,"text":"散发性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"肌胃黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 多发生于雏鸡，发病年龄多在2~6周龄。临床特征是鸡呕吐黑色物，肌胃黏膜损伤，病变由轻度的表层糜烂到广泛的溃疡形成和出血，呈散发性，死亡率有时高达20%。

label: [{"start":18,"end":24,"text":"鸡肌胃糜烂症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 饲料中鱼粉添加比例过高或质量低是引起鸡肌胃糜烂症的原因

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"肉用仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"肌胃糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 。据报道，肉用仔鸡日粮中含有鱼粉量超过12%时即可引起肌胃糜烂、溃疡和坏死，尚未发现8%以下发病的。但后来的研究发现。

label: [{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"肌胃糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":39,"text":"鸡肌胃糜烂症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":61,"end":67,"text":"鸡肌胃糜烂症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":55,"end":59,"text":"霉菌毒素","labels":["disease"]},{"start":49,"end":54,"text":"维生素缺乏","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 并非所有的鱼粉都会引起肌胃糜烂。近来的研究还表明，鱼粉的变质是引起鸡肌胃糜烂症的直接诱因.饲料中的维生素缺乏和霉菌毒素也与鸡肌胃糜烂症有关。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"食欲减退","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"瞌睡","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"闭眼缩颈","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"步态不稳","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡表现为食欲减退或消失，精神不振，瞌睡，闭眼缩颈，步态不稳，羽毛松乱。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"肉髯发绀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"发绀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"贫血苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"嗦囊胀满","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"胀满","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"淡黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":26,"text":"淡褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"黑嗦子病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"肉髯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡冠、肉髯发绀或贫血苍白。病鸡嗦囊胀满，外观呈淡褐色或淡黑色，故常称为“黑嗦子病”。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":26,"text":"黑褐色稀薄的水样物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":57,"text":"黑褐色物残留","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":44,"text":"死亡鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"口腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"黑吐病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"黑褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":54,"text":"黑褐色","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 倒提病鸡或用手挤压病鸡嗦囊，可见有黑褐色稀薄的水样物从口腔中流出，故称“黑吐病”。死亡鸡口腔中也可见有黑褐色物残留。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"病死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"全身消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"肌肉苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"嗦囊扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":40,"text":"十二指肠内容物呈棕黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"棕黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"黏稠","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"嗦囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"十二指肠","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病死鸡可见全身消瘦，肌肉苍白，嗦囊扩张，嗦囊、腺胃、肌胃和十二指肠内容物呈棕黑色、黏稠。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"腺胃扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"胃壁迟缓","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"迟缓","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"黏膜脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":24,"text":"肌胃角质膜颜色变深","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"暗绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"黑色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"表面粗糙","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":44,"text":"外观呈树皮样","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"胃壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":20,"text":"肌胃角质膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"颜色变深","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 腺胃扩张，胃壁迟缓，黏膜脱落。肌胃角质膜颜色变深，呈暗绿色或黑色，表面粗糙，外观呈树皮样。

label: [{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"糜烂","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":43,"text":"溃疡灶深部有出血斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"肌胃中区","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"肌胃后区","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 腺胃与肌胃交界处稍下方至肌胃中区及肌胃后区常见不同程度的糜烂或溃疡，溃疡灶深部有出血斑。

label: [{"start":0,"end":13,"text":"肌胃内容物呈暗绿色或黑褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"黑褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":9,"text":"暗绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":25,"text":"混有多量的黑褐色水样物","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"黑褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":37,"text":"盲肠肠壁变薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":47,"text":"黏膜上皮脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":47,"text":"脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"十二指肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"盲肠肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"黏膜上皮","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"变薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 肌胃内容物呈暗绿色或黑褐色并混有多量的黑褐色水样物。十二指肠、盲肠肠壁变薄或增厚，黏膜上皮脱落，并有充血或出血。

label: [{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"轻度炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"脾色泽苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":33,"text":"胆囊扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"暗绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"肾多肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":54,"text":"泄殖腔黏膜充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"小肠后段","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"盲肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"直肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":17,"text":"心","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":19,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"胆囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":39,"end":40,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":52,"text":"泄殖腔黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 小肠后段、盲肠和直肠有轻度炎症。心、肝、脾色泽苍白、萎缩，胆囊扩张，呈暗绿色。肾多肿胀、出血。泄殖腔黏膜充血。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"控制鱼粉用量","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":27,"text":"保证鱼粉质量","labels":["control"]},{"start":28,"end":35,"text":"鱼粉要妥善保管","labels":["control"]}]
text: 控制鱼粉用量，日粮中鱼粉含量应在8%以下。保证鱼粉质量，鱼粉要妥善保管和贮藏，防止霉变。

label: [{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"甲腈咪胍","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 如怀疑鱼粉中含有糜烂素可在每千克饲料中加10mg甲腈咪胍预防。

label: [{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"西米替丁","labels":["drug"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"组胺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 由于肌胃糜烂素必须通过组胺才能起作用，故可在饲料中按0.001%的用量添加西米替丁进行预防。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"加强舍内通风","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":23,"text":"采取合理的饲养密度","labels":["control"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"营养缺乏症","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"代谢病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":44,"end":50,"text":"鸡肌胃糜烂症","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 加强舍内通风以保持空气清新；采取合理的饲养密度。另外，一些营养缺乏症、代谢病的发生可诱发鸡肌胃糜烂症。

label: [{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"立即更换饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":11,"end":21,"text":"调整日粮中的鱼粉用量","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":30,"text":"更换无鱼粉的饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":31,"end":38,"text":"停止使用抗生素","labels":["control"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"抗生素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 发现中毒立即更换饲料并调整日粮中的鱼粉用量或更换无鱼粉的饲料，停止使用抗生素。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":27,"text":"碳酸氢钠溶液","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 对发病初期的病鸡，可采用0.2%~0.4%碳酸氢钠溶液饮水，每日早晚各1次，连续2天。

label: [{"start":1,"end":4,"text":"病重鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"肌内注射","labels":["control"]},{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"维生素K₃","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"止血敏","labels":["drug"]},{"start":49,"end":52,"text":"大群鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":60,"end":65,"text":"维生素B₆","labels":["drug"]},{"start":66,"end":70,"text":"维生素C","labels":["drug"]},{"start":71,"end":76,"text":"维生素K₃","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 对病重鸡每只可肌内注射维生素K₃0.5~1.0mg和止血敏50~100mg,每日2次，连用4天。对大群鸡，可在饲料中添加维生素B₆、维生素C和维生素K₃,其用量分别为每千克饲料中加3～7mg/kg、30～50mg/kg和2~3mg/kg。
